version_description:
VideoDay finally launched! Thank you for your patience.

Merge your photos, GIF, Live Photos and video clips on your iPhone or iPad with VideoDay. Do not miss the opportunity to add music, text, filters and transitions! Share it on your favorite social media such as YouTube, Instagram or TikTok!

VideoDay app was made with users' requests for video editing features. Thanks to your support and feedback, we could develop VideoDay.
If you are enjoying VideoDay, please leave us reviews. This will be so much helpful to us!
If you have any inquiries, feedback or issues, get in touch with us at: videoday.ios@imgbase.me

Bug Fixes & Usability Improvement

Thank you for using the VideoDay!
Trim and merge videos, and add music, texts, and transitions, like a pro. Editing will be super easy but you will get high-quality videos! With VidoeDay, every day is VideoDay!

If you are enjoying VideoDay, please leave us reviews. This will be so much helpful to us!
If you have any inquiries, feedback or issues, get in touch with us at: videoday.ios@imgbase.me

New updated VideoDay, the easy video editor! Make video with high quality. Now you can:
- Use PIP(Picture in Picture): Overlay another video, GIF, photo or Live Photo on video!
- Add new 5 songs for soft Background Music.
- Add text style to Favorites.
- Use Mouse and Trackpad on iPad(iPadOS 13.4 required).

Also, we did usability Improvement & Bug fixes.

New updated VideoDay, the easy video editor! Make video with high quality. Now you can:
- Make an amazing slide show with Clip Motion(Ken Burns effect).
- Freeze a frame of video and make it motionless scene.
- Play your video backward with Reverse.
- Make videos with better quality(FHD).
Now, VideoDay supports 8 more languages! (Chinese Traditional, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Russian, Thai and Vietnamese)
Also, we did usability Improvement & Bug fixes.

If you are enjoying VideoDay, please leave us reviews. This will be so much helpful to us!
If you have any inquiries, feedback or issues, get in touch with us at: videoday.ios@imgbase.me

VideoDay, a Video editing app that anyone can use easily. Now you can:

- Audio > Record
Popularly requested! Now you can do voice recordings and add them into your videos.
- Audio > Music > Extract Audio
Extract audio from video, and use it as background music.
- Mosaic
A mosaic feature has been added, now you can hide wherever you want in your video.
- Filter > Import LUT
By using LUT files, you can add your own filters.
- Clip Menu > Frame
Various video frame designs have been added, edit your video even more professionally.

Merry Christmas~!
- 10 new Christmas and winter themed background music tracks have been added.
- A surprise event! You can temporarily use Christmas themed paid subtitles for free. Please check the tree icon!
- The app icon has changed to a cute ornament shape. Apply the limited end of year period special icon. You can always change this in the settings.

With these features, we’ve also improved the user experience and fixed bugs.

Thank you to every user who has shown love to our app and given various feedback to us. Thanks to your opinions and intentions, we could improve VideoDay by adding new features.

Enjoy the new features, and please leave a review if you like them! Your review is always a big help and support for us. And if you have any inconvenience while using new features, please contact us through email(videoday.ios@imgbase.me).

VideoDay, a Video editing app that anyone can use easily. Now you can:

- Audio > Record
Popularly requested! Now you can do voice recordings and add them into your videos.
- Audio > Music > Extract Audio
Extract audio from video, and use it as background music.
- Mosaic
A mosaic feature has been added, now you can hide wherever you want in your video.
- Filter > Import LUT
By using LUT files, you can add your own filters.
- Clip Menu > Frame
Various video frame designs have been added, edit your video even more professionally.

Merry Christmas~!
- 10 new Christmas and winter themed background music tracks have been added.
- A surprise event! You can temporarily use Christmas themed paid subtitles for free. Please check the tree icon!
- The app icon has changed to a cute ornament shape. Apply the limited end of year period special icon. You can always change this in the settings.

With these features, we’ve also improved the user experience and fixed bugs.

Thank you to every user who has shown love to our app and given various feedback to us. Thanks to your opinions and intentions, we could improve VideoDay by adding new features.

Enjoy the new features, and please leave a review if you like them! Your review is always a big help and support for us. And if you have any inconvenience while using new features, please contact us through email(videoday.ios@imgbase.me).

- Bug Fixes & Usability Improvement

VideoDay, a Video editing app that anyone can use easily. Now you can:

• Effect > Opacity
• Now, you can adjust opacity, as well as fade in and out of effects.

• Clip Menu > Speed
• Set play speed up to 10x and make more fun videos.
• Apply the same speed to all clips at once.

• Audio > Volume
• Adjust volume up to 2x louder than the original.

With these features, we’ve also improved the user experience and fixed bugs.

Enjoy the new features, and please leave a review if you like them! Your review is always a big help and support for us. And if you have any inconvenience while using new features, please contact us through email(videoday.ios@imgbase.me).

• Bug Fixes & Usability Improvement

If you are enjoying VideoDay, please leave us reviews. Your review is always a big help and support for us. And if you have any inconvenience while using the VideoDay, please contact us through email(videoday.ios@imgbase.me).
